articles.content:
Irrfan Khan, a veteran character actor in Bollywood movies and a one of Indias best-known exports to Hollywood, has died. He was 53. 
Khan played the police inspector in Slumdog Millionaire and the park executive Masrani in Jurassic World.
He also appeared … [+3291 chars]
